name: Super Thin Ice
description:
Super Thin Ice (Rapid Game Prototyping) Version 1.0

A recreation of the 'Thin Ice' minigame from Club Penguin for a testing project. Please note that not all mechanics are exactly the same due to time restrictions. It may not be possible to complete every single level to 100%! There are also some bugs, particularly in the movement. (Restarting the level should fix any problems)

Press 'Escape' at any point in the game to leave to the ending screen, and whether you finish all the levels or decide to leave partway through, please take note of the stats you got and fill out the form below!

Made by Mikhael O'Brien, Leyla Ozluk, Kuan Wang, and William Hendarto. Level design from Club Penguin.
